content: There's no documentation around expectations for what includeIdentityClaim values are valid?

We don't really have any experience with this feature; didn't want to over specify -- I think currently they're really just hints for a server. Interesting questions include: should there be a way to request existing elements but "blurred" like a birth month instead of date, or initials instead of a name. Would love to see issuers experiment with this kind of thing; right now other than the demo c19.cards I'm not sure any issuers support this "includeIdentityClaim" feature in any capacity.

Is there additional conversation about the intent of includeIdentityClaim elsewhere (this topic is definitely a great start)? Following/I'd like to link to this topic and to where this is mentioned in the SHC spec from the FAST Identity project page for continued discussion, since it sounds relevant to identity and matching...
Beyond here + GitHub, nothing I'm aware of
